meanings.definition: A vitamin essential for the body's metabolism.
meanings.sent1: Niacins are important for how our bodies break down food.
meanings.sent2: I make sure to eat foods rich in niacins to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The niacins in my breakfast cereal were having a party in my stomach!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like niacins, fueling her through the day.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that niacins are like little helpers for our metabolism.

meanings.definition: A substance found in certain foods that can help lower cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent1: Including niacins in your diet can be beneficial for your heart health.
meanings.sent2: My doctor recommended foods with niacins to improve my cholesterol.
meanings.sent3: The niacins in the salad were on a mission to fight bad cholesterol!
meanings.sent4: Her cholesterol levels dropped like magic after adding niacins to her meals.
meanings.sent5: I imagined niacins as tiny superheroes fighting off the bad cholesterol in my body.
